issue.title: [Python] Memory leak when converting Arrow tables with array columns to Pandas dataframes.
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1973](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1973). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There appears to be a memory leak when using PyArrow to convert tables containing array columns to Pandas DataFrames.

 See the `test_memory_leak.py` example here: https://gitlab.com/ostrokach/pyarrow_duplicate_column_errors
